alert.note: Alert for Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 23 at 7:39AM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Inland Willacy County. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the Freeze Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
